title: 21 Potato Chip Dip Recipes That'll Please a Crowd
description: Find potato chip dip ideas that everyone will love, such as Ketchup Dip and Bacon and Cheddar Dip. Get the easy chip dip recipes here.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 21 Potato Chip Dip Recipes That'll Please a Crowd By Corey Williams Corey Williams Corey Williams is a food writer for MyRecipes and Allrecipes. She has a decade of journalism experience. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on November 4, 2021 Close Credits: Allrecipes There's nothing sadder than a naked potato chip, so dress up your favorite snack with one of our most irresistible sauces and dips for chips. From quick and easy ideas that come together at the last minute to restaurant-worthy options that will impress everyone at your next party, you'll want to bookmark this collection of our best potato chip dips — you'll come back to it again and again. 01 of 22 Fast and Easy Chip Dip View Recipe Save You'll be the most popular person at any party when you show up with this three-ingredient potato chip dip that comes together in just five minutes. 25 Easy Dip Recipes With Five Ingredients or Less 02 of 22 Ketchup Dip View Recipe Save Rae This quick potato chip dip (made with just sour cream, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, and onions) is simply irresistible. Make sure you refrigerate it for at least two hours before serving to allow the flavors to meld. 03 of 22 Gramp's Ranch Dip View Recipe Save Christina Take traditional ranch dip up a notch with this jalapeno-spiked version. Reviewer MomKat added minced onion, onion powder, and chives for even more flavor. 04 of 22 Shrimp Cream Cheese Spread View Recipe Save Smye Sarrel "My family and relatives thought this dip was awesome," reviewer Susan Bozin Meloche says of this shrimp-packed potato chip dip. "Very fresh and full of flavor." 10 Shrimp Dip With Cream Cheese Recipes 05 of 22 Creamy Onion Dip View Recipe Save Allrecipes This sour cream and chive chip dip is seasoned with onion powder and garlic powder. "Be careful, you may eat an entire bag of chips with this dip," warns culinary producer NicoleMcmom. 06 of 22 Everything Onion Dip View Recipe Save Everything Onion Dip. Chef John There's a lot going on in this potato chip dip, but we're not mad about it. Mayonnaise and sour cream are mixed with olive oil, cayenne pepper, shallots, onions, and chives. 07 of 22 Instant Pot French Onion Dip View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole Use your Instant Pot to make this creamy French onion chip dip with cream cheese, sour cream, butter, onions, and Worcestershire sauce. 08 of 22 Baked Potato Dip View Recipe Save Photo by footballgrl16. footballgrl16 If you like baked potatoes, you'll love this creamy cheese dip topped with green onions, Cheddar cheese, and bacon bits. "This dip is wonderful," says reviewer islandgirl8828. "Tried it for the first time last weekend for a party and it was a total hit." 09 of 22 World's Easiest and Most Amazing Two-Ingredient Dip View Recipe Save Christina Make this budget-friendly chip dip with just two ingredients: sour cream and soy sauce. "The kids dipped potato chips in it earlier in the day and LOVED it," says reviewer and Allrecipes Allstar Christina. "We used the rest as a dipping sauce for our steaks at dinner and that was yummy too." 12 Easy 2-Ingredient Appetizer Recipes 10 of 22 Pickle Dip View Recipe Save Allrecipes "If you love pickles, you will never buy a store-bought dip again," according to recipe creator James B, who says this recipe is easy to customize to your personal taste. 11 of 22 Chip Dip View Recipe Save bd.weld Get back to basics with this all-purpose potato chip dip. It's easy to make in just five minutes with cream cheese, Worcestershire sauce, milk, mayonnaise, and chopped onions. 12 of 22 Bacon and Cheddar Dip View Recipe Save Mrs Chamb Sour cream, ranch dressing mix, Cheddar cheese, and bacon bits form this irresistible potato chip dip. Reviewer Karey suggests adding cream cheese to create a crowd-pleasing cheese ball. 13 of 22 Curry Dip for Crudites View Recipe Save MommaBean3 "I will admit, I saw the ingredients and wondered how the dip would taste," reviewer and Allrecipes Allstar MommaBean3 says of this veggie and chip dip made with mayonnaise, curry powder, and ketchup. "I have to say, I was pleasantly surprised by this dip." 14 of 22 Southwest Dipping Sauce View Recipe Save Tammy Lynn This creamy chip dip (made with mayonnaise, ketchup, horseradish, paprika, oregano, and cayenne pepper) also pairs well with veggies and onion rings, according to recipe creator USMCWIFE03. 15 of 22 Leek and Onion Vegetable Dip View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole Leek- and onion-flavored dried soup mixes give this creamy potato chip dip lots of flavor. "I took this to a New Year's Eve party and it was a huge hit," says reviewer NANCYLEEIL. 16 of 22 Seafood Dip View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole Imitation crabmeat gives this veggie and chip dip, made super creamy with mayonnaise and sour cream, fantastic flavor, and texture. 17 of 22 Ranch-Style Party Dip View Recipe Save Tammy Lynn "I can't stop munching on it," reviewer CookingLikeCrazy says of this chunky cottage cheese and ranch potato chip dip. "I didn't change a thing." 18 of 22 Roasted Garlic Dip View Recipe Save Allrecipes Fans of flavor will absolutely love this garlic-packed chip dip — it packs a strong punch. "Definitely would make this again," raves reviewer Angie P. "Great dip to entertain with." 19 of 22 Mozzarella Dip View Recipe Save Tanya S. This easy, cheesy, and super creamy chip dip (made with a delicious mixture of mozzarella and Parmesan) will be a hit at any gathering. 20 of 22 Copycat Dipping Sauce View Recipe Save Yoly If you like Chick-fil-A's signature sauce, you'll love this four-ingredient copycat version. Pair it with chips, fries, veggies, and so much more. Our 12 Best Copycat Sauces From Your Favorite Restaurants 21 of 22 Hot Asiago Dip View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole Non-fat cottage cheese and cream cheese keep this Asiago chip dip on the light side, while Dijon mustard and jalapenos add spicy flavor. 22 of 22 More Inspiration ECEats Try one of Our Best Hot and Cheesy Dips. Plus, explore our entire collections of Dip Recipes and Sauce and Condiment Recipes. Baked Buffalo Chicken Dip Slow Cooker Reuben Dip Vidalia Sweet Onion Dip Explore more: Recipes Appetizers and Snacks Dips and Spreads Recipes Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
